text: The Lippe is a river in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. It is a right tributary of the Rhine. The river has long. Its source is in the Teutoburg Forest in Bad Lippspringe. It flows west through Paderborn and Lippstadt, along the northern edge of the Ruhr Area. The river enters the Rhine at Wesel. Category:Rivers of North Rhine-Westphalia
title: Lippe (river)
